scripts.migration/add: dotenv -e ./src/ContactsDatabase.Api/.env -- bash -c 'dotnet ef migrations add $npm_config_migration_name --project src/ContactsDatabase.Infrastructure -- "$ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection"'
scripts.arg/help: echo 'npm run arg --name="input your value here"'
scripts.recreate: npm run down && npm run up
scripts.db/drop: npm run db/drop-connections || npm run db/drop-database
scripts.db/drop-connections: docker exec -it contacts-database-db-1 bash -c 'psql -U postgres --no-password -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pg_stat_activity.pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE pg_stat_activity.datname = 'contacts' AND pid <> pg_backend_pid();"'
scripts.db/drop-database: docker exec -it contacts-database-db-1 bash -c 'psql -U postgres --no-password -c "DROP DATABASE contacts;"'
